name: 50 Levels Game
description:
This game has 50 levels in it.  FULLSCREEN is better to play this.
( Holding SHIFT with W S A D will allow you to run )
W - Move Forward
 S  - Move Backward
 A - Move Left
 D - Move Right
Mouse- Use to look in a direction
SpaceBar to Jump
If your Cursor Arrow is not showing up, press the ESCAPE KEY to make it appear. This game will continue to be updated as time goes by.
